mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_reply (reply_seq, reply_userName, board_seq, reply_contents, reply_reg_date) VALUES (board_reply_seq.nextval, #{reply_userName}, #{board_seq}, #{reply_contents}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board_reply WHERE board_seq = #{board_seq} order By reply_reg_date desc
mapper.update: update board_reply set reply_contents = #{reply_contents} , reply_reg_date = sysdate where board_seq = #{board_seq} and reply_seq = #{reply_seq}
